body_html: Hi, @pmccarter . Because tf.reshape is generated automatically, and the implementation is written by C++, hence the question is more difficult to debug than I expected. I opened a PR #12127 to take a try to fix it. If your work has not been started yet, is it OK to link the PR to the issue? Thanks.
body_text: Hi, @pmccarter . Because tf.reshape is generated automatically, and the implementation is written by C++, hence the question is more difficult to debug than I expected. I opened a PR #12127 to take a try to fix it. If your work has not been started yet, is it OK to link the PR to the issue? Thanks.
body: Hi, @pmccarter . Because `tf.reshape` is generated automatically, and the implementation is written by C++, hence the question is more difficult to debug than I expected. I opened a PR #12127 to take a try to fix it. If your work has not been started yet, is it OK to link the PR to the issue? Thanks.
